sentence.Network_en: The volva of the mushroom is often at the bottom.
sentence.Network_cn: 蘑菇的菌托通常在底部.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 菌字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 菌苗〖 vaccine〗 菌托〖 volva〗 菌子〖 fungus〗.
菱角螺_互动百科 ... 科： 海兔螺科 Ovulidae 属： 菱角螺属 Volva 种： 菱角螺 V. volva habei.

list.abs: obliterate的用法例句1. obliterate volva 不显菌托2. Subfreezing temperatures obliterate these vesse.
saccate的用法例句1. saccate volva 囊状菌托2. Petals 5, base saccate to shortly clawed. 花瓣5，基.
lanose volva毛绒状菌托 lanose volvalanosollanostadienelanostadienollanostanelanostenelanostenepentollanostenollanostenonelanosterinelanosterollanosterol typelanoxinlanpalmitic.
英语造句：1. adnate volva 贴生菌托2. Calyx funnelform, adnate to ovary, lobes valvat.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: modern Latin, from Latin volvere 'to roll, wrap round'

means.word_mean: 1. cuplike structure around the base of the stalk of certain fungi
